official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to include hearings aids and dentures among the items and services for which payment may be made under the supplementary medical insurance program.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide payment for hearing aids and dentures under the supplementary medical insurance program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to include hearings aids and dentures among the items and services for which payment may be made under the supplementary medical insurance program.
